text: Syed Muhammad Sharif or more commonly S.M. Sharif was a Muslim Barrister from Patna, Bihar, British India. He was an active leader of the All India Muslim League party in his area and also one of the members of the League's Working Committee of March 1940 which drafted the Lahore Resolution. SM Sharif prepared a report titled 'sharif report' which gave an exaggerated account of the sufferings of the muslims and gave a vantage point to launch attack on the Congress. Category:Pakistan Movement Category:Leaders of All India Muslim League Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: S.M. Sharif
